alert.note: Alert for Lyon; Wabaunsee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 3:22PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Morris, southern Wabaunsee and northern Lyon Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 322 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles north of Bushong, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Council Grove, Eskridge, Allen, Admire, Bushong, Dunlap and Council Grove Lake. This includes Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 142 and 154. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for east central Kansas.
